document.title: Publishing for Black Professionals: How You Can Gain More Influence in a Diverse Universe
document.abstract: This inspiring workshop provides insight on how to gain more influence through professional writing. It will give participants a simple strategy for publishing. Topics include book publishing, popular press articles, commentaries, and academic articles. Participants will learn how to better position themselves in the future with a market edge.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
